head.title: Food Service Closure Program - Effingham Community Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Effingham Junior High School

a.h1: Effingham Community Schools Board of Education
a.div: Where the Search for Excellence Begins

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

strong.span: Effingham Unit #40 Food Service during School Closure

div.p: Beginning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, Effingham Unit #40 will provide sack lunches and a snack for any student who needs one. These lunches will be provided in the manner listed below:

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

div.p: Effingham Unit #40 will have employee volunteers at each site to distribute the food.
